name: The endless hallway
description:
This reimagining of the P.T. Hallway is a complete, but small game.
Enter the endless hallway once more, to experience a new story.

The game runs in the Unity3D engine and should run on any pc with Windows 7 or higher. 

As our first project it's very minimalistic but very pretty and takes from 30 to 60 minutes to complete. Please be warned that the first loading may take a few more minutes.

Please give us some feedback on what you liked and what not.
